description: This table extracts the related multiple response item Task Log: Cleaned Up Task Instances (I LTK 81919).

columns.name: ACTIVITY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: OUTREACH_CSN_ID
columns.description: A list of Outreach (RCH) contact instances that were cleaned up by a nightly background process as a result of the task actions.
